name: Genuine Stone Ground Whole Red Wheat Flour
description: Whole Red Wheat Flour is 100% whole grain and stone-ground to retain the natural nutrition of the grain and provide a rich, nutty flavor. This flour is ideal for artisan breads, bagels, rolls, tortillas and more. Our traditional, stone-ground whole wheat flour made from hard red winter wheat is perfectly suited for all your baking needs. A hearty, nutty flavor perfect for artisan breads.
